amendment.description: An amendment numbered 22 printed in Part B of House Report 118-535 to increase and decrease funding for the purpose of expressing the urgency of expeditiously and efficiently utilizing increased demolition funding on Navy and Marine Corps bases.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kiggans (VA) amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kiggans (VA) amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
